posts.title: Victoria pulled out but how was the Commonwealth Games started by a Canadian sports journalist angry at perceived American arrogance?
posts.body: he great irony about the Commonwealth Games is that Britain nearly didn’t participate in the first-ever edition, called the British Empire Games, in 1930. Now, its existence itself is an irony in the post-colonial world of 2022, with a stale stench of a relic about it. And with Victoria pulling out of hosting, the relevance of Commonwealth Games has yet again come back into question

posts.title: Federer + Nadal + Djokovic = Alcaraz
posts.body: A few weeks back Roger Federer was startled when he heard the lavish praise heaped on Carlos Alcaraz by his ex coach, the Croatian Ivan Ljubicic; that Alcaraz has a bit of Federer, Rafael Nadal, and Novak Djokovic. Federer’s response was not to put so much pressure on the kid – “He said that? … It’s a lot to live up to”.

posts.title: Ajinkya Rahane, in a corner to save his Test career again
posts.body: As he prepares for the Trinidad Test starting Thursday, Ajinkya Rahane may be chuckling to himself thinking about selectors’ whims. Kept out of the , till he played some swashbuckling knocks for Chennai Super Kings in the Indian Premier League.

posts.title: David Warner’s cryptic post before ENG vs AUS 4th Ashes Test

posts.title: Move Over, FAANG: 1 Unstoppable "Magnificent 7" Stock to Buy Hand Over Fist
posts.body: The stock market has a new leadership group, but it features several familiar names.
